DOC.HEADLINE: ARMS SALES
DOC.TEXT: * The ironies of the " news " paper . On the one hand , we read about talks for treaties of peace between Arabs and Jews , and talks for treaties having to do with nuclear disarmament.Then we read that " the industrial powers flock to this small but wealthy nation in the post-Cold War push to sell weapons " ( " Targeting Taiwan for Arms Deals , " March 14 ) . We arm small nations to the teeth and then expect peace . If it were impossible for nations to acquire arms , then they could only attack each other with rocks and sticks . Why is it legal for any nation to produce and sell arms ? They ( the buyers ) should be spending that money on building or rebuilding their infrastructures , their industrial bases , and above all else , their educational systems , not wasting it on weapons . Why are we not in the midst of treaty talks that ban the production of all weapons , and the trade between nations of same ? PRESTON COSGROVE Los Angeles
